sentences.sContent: When the man saw this he put a halter on the ass at once, and gave him back to his owner.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the man saw this he put a halter on the ass at once, and gave him back to his owner.
sentences.sCn: 当这个男人看到这个情景后，他立刻把缰绳套在驴上，把它还给了它的主人。

trans.tranOther: a rope or leather band that fastens around a horse’s head, usually used to lead the horse
